body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting us. My name is Benjamin Lopez and I'm from ABC Auto Group. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Tiffany Hayes.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Tiffany. Can you please provide me with your phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, three six zero, two one four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And could you also confirm your email address, one zero zero, tiffany dot h at email dot com?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great. We appreciate your patience in addressing the data management issue at our Car Dealership. Is there anything specific that has left you feeling disappointed?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I've had multiple incorrect invoices sent to me which has caused quite a bit of confusion.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand how frustrating that can be. Thank you for bringing this to our attention, Tiffany. We'll work to resolve this issue promptly. Thank you for your time.
